r.d:
OAuth is an authorization protocol built on top of HTTP which allows applications to securely access data without having to store usernames and passwords.
Requirements: ext/hash (now a part of PHP core)
r.n: * fix config.w32 (cmb) * fix 7.3 segfault (rlerdorf) * replace uint-uint32_t, ulong-zend_ulong (Jan-E) * handle cases where a passed in array might be a const (keyurdg) * Fix configure for recent cURL versions (cmb) * Bug #76722 cURL library headers not recognized on Debian 9 (js361014)
